Testing vfmsub213ps (128-bit)
Test 1: a*b - c
a: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 
b: 5.000000 6.000000 7.000000 8.000000 
c: 9.000000 10.000000 11.000000 12.000000 
result: -4.000000 2.000000 10.000000 20.000000 
result (hex): 0xC0800000 0x40000000 0x41200000 0x41A00000 

Test 2: Special values
a: inf nan -inf 0.000000 
b: 2.000000 3.000000 -1.000000 1.000000 
c: 1.000000 1.000000 1.000000 1.000000 
result: inf nan inf -1.000000 
result (hex): 0x7F800000 0x7FC00000 0x7F800000 0xBF800000

Test 2: Memory operand
a: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 0.500000 0.600000 0.700000 0.800000 
b: 0.900000 1.000000 1.100000 1.200000 1.300000 1.400000 1.500000 1.600000

result: -1.610000 -1.600000 -1.570000 -1.520000 -1.450000 -1.360000 -1.250000 -1.120000
